name: Bizmark
description:
Waking up in a dark hallway... Is this Hell? I see a a few hallways leading into some kind of abyss, but where should I go? North? South...? Hmm...

This is the world of Bizmark—brutal and mysterious in its complexity, An endless world sprawls before you. Will you be one of the lucky explorers to survive more than a snowball's chance? I think not! But please, if you must prove yourself, go ahead. However, relinquish your faith for what God you may believe in cannot help you. Collect your gold and set off on a journey that can only be described as... Bizmark!
